meta.title: Avalon Wilshire - Apartments in Los Angeles, CA | AvalonBay Communities | AvalonBay Communities

meta.name: title
meta.content: Avalon Wilshire - Apartments in Los Angeles, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.span: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Avalon Wilshire, located adjacent to Hancock Park and surrounded by Hollywood and Beverly Hills, boasts one-, two- and three-bedroom Los Angeles apartments and townhomes. Our newly renovated apartments for rent in Los Angeles come with top-of-the-range features including stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, tiled backsplashes, and hard surface flooring. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, Amazon package lockers, and more. Impress your guests when you entertain them in our beautifully landscaped courtyards with grills or work off the stress of the work week in our newly renovated fitness center featuring fitness studio with virtual fitness programming. This is not just apartment living. This is living up.

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.h2: Only the best for your best life

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our apartment homes were designed with you in mind. Learn more about the different finish packages we offer at our community.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: See what we do to take pet friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: From fitness amenities to resident perks, we offer a variety of spaces and places to help you meet your wellness goals.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

Avalon Wilshire, located adjacent to Hancock Park and surrounded by Hollywood and Beverly Hills, boasts one-, two- and three-bedroom Los Angeles apartments and townhomes. Our newly renovated apartments for rent in Los Angeles come with top-of-the-range features including stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, tiled backsplashes, and hard surface flooring. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, Amazon package lockers, and more. Impress your guests when you entertain them in our beautifully landscaped courtyards with grills or work off the stress of the work week in our newly renovated fitness center featuring fitness studio with virtual fitness programming.
